title: minerminer3456
author: minerminer3456
created_time: September 24, 2022, 05:45:26 PMLast edit: January 31, 2023, 11:15:22 AM by minerminer3456
content: Hello friends. As miners, we are all going through difficult times. Good luck everyone.I will leave below the links of a project that I saw while searching for mining coins with you on the internet as most of us do. It can still be considered a new project. As far as I can see, it has not been pre-mined. Its. Developer mentions that if the project becomes widespread, he can make coin listings on the CMC and the exchanges.I started mining, but there is no point in mining alone  Therefore, I am sharing the information with yo:)  If you examine and like it, you can mine it, which is very easy to mine.Note: I am a miner like you and will be mining BOBCOIN for a while right now. I have no affiliation with the project.Website: https://bobcoin.cash/GitHub: https://github.com/BobShoaun/Bobcoin-ClientWhitepaper: https://www.bobng.me/articles/how-i-made-my-own-cryptocurrencyDiscord: https://discord.gg/Xaqga8SKFaucet: https://bobcoin.cash/faucetSOLO MINING: https://bobcoin.cash/mine#soloPOOL MINING: https://bobcoin.cash/mine#poolI found only one youtube video which is non-English: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Utuly3sTalE.

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: 6 Blocks found in 6 hours. Wallet balance is 00.00. WTH?

comments.author: minerminer3456
comments.body: Some of his experiences during mining:1. More than one person can find each block, but only one person approves and can obtain that block. Unsuccessful block attempts are seen in the system as "Orphaned".2. Opening multiple tabs in the Bowser tab and mining seems very dangerous for RAM I guess. I tried opening 10 tabs and I think there was a problem with my RAMs. I think that opening many tabs does not contribute to mining. Therefore, I continue with ONLY one tab.Have good mining.

comments.author: pdneves
comments.body: If anyone is interested join the official discord for BOBCOIN, the developer is there, https://discord.gg/SW4XSD4UmZ.OP update the post with the Discord link please.

comments.author: aposhtol
comments.body: Browser mining sounds like vegan meat.

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: MMmmm, vegan meat.Browser mining sha256 is very weird indeed.The faucet gives me a blank page after pressing the button. Is there a glitch?

comments.author: LeadPoisoning
comments.body: I mined 5 blocks and still have a 0 balance 24h later, which is why I'm not mining anymore.

comments.author: LeadPoisoning
comments.body: A 100% orphan rate over 5 blocks doesn't make me want to mine it either...

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: The first block was mined more than a year ago : https://bobcoin.cash/block/0000000feec941f61402e216aad021939642cfee2e97e6fc45c7a692dd3a759fStill there is no standalone wallet, The whole concept is still reliable on the single website, which goes offline every now and then.It looks like an armature experiment rather than a professional project.

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: This has the same problem as before. The website barely loads and the mining client sits forming and verifying candidate block...  well it has been sitting at that status for over 15 minutes now.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Quote from: minerminer3456 on October 11, 2022, 05:13:13 PMI'm mining. Bobcoin has been actively mined for about two weeks and is still in Alpha. Of course, it has a lot of shortcomings. Because this is the Alpha version. Not beta or final version. I believe the developer will push the system further over time so  I keep mining.Hope so, but isn't he taking too much of time?

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: Quote from: thikachhey on October 11, 2022, 06:28:49 PMQuote from: minerminer3456 on October 11, 2022, 05:13:13 PMI'm mining. Bobcoin has been actively mined for about two weeks and is still in Alpha. Of course, it has a lot of shortcomings. Because this is the Alpha version. Not beta or final version. I believe the developer will push the system further over time so  I keep mining.Hope so, but isn't he taking too much of time?I got it working. Cleared browser history and mining resumed.

comments.author: FlaJa
comments.body: Quote from: minerminer3456 on September 24, 2022, 05:45:26 PMHello friends. As miners, we are all going through difficult times. Good luck everyone.I will leave below the links of a project that I saw while searching for mining coins with you on the internet as most of us do. It can still be considered a new project. As far as I can see, it has not been pre-mined. Its. Developer mentions that if the project becomes widespread, he can make coin listings on the CMC and the stock market.I started mining, but there is no point in mining alone  Therefore, I am sharing the information with yo:)  If you examine and like it, you can mine it, which is very easy to mine.I guess there is no mining option in the pool at the moment. If there is a pool operator among us, maybe they can create the option to mine the coin in the pool.Note: I am a miner like you and will be mining BOBCOIN for a while right now. I have no affiliation with the project.Website: https://bobcoin.cash/GitHub: https://github.com/BobShoaun/Bobcoin-ClientWhitepaper: https://www.bobng.me/articles/how-i-made-my-own-cryptocurrencyDiscord: https://discord.gg/Xaqga8SKI found only one youtube video which is non-English: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Utuly3sTalE.Very fun project. There has been a problem for 2 weeks andthe dev or devs cannot solve the problem. If you express your opinion in discord, you will be blocked hahahaha. The statement: "the project has the amateur level and has to do many more". If you comment directly on it, you will be insulted and blocked. VERY professional

The statement: "the project has the amateur level and has to do many more". If you comment directly on it, you will be insulted and blocked. VERY professional I was watching that "debate" on discord, I think you fail to understand that the dev didn't promote / post the project here it was someone that found it. It was intended to introduce crypto to some family members when it took off, dev created the discord channel and people started to join when I joined there were like 5 people. This is a project in development by 1 person that has a full time job and some other responsabilities. And there is no problem for 2 weeks, the problem as already been addressed and will be solved. From the discord the dev yesterday when asked if the coin was dead:Quote Its not dont worry, more development will come eventuallyI'm not affiliated with the project, I'm just a miner like you probably are but I understand what this project is.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Quote from: minerminer3456 on October 29, 2022, 02:59:13 PMnode fixed and mining is active now!This is going on and off from the first block which was mined a year earlier till now. Works for few hours and takes weeks for fixing. If it takes one year for fixing the site, then god help the project.

comments.author: Diabaths
comments.body: its really good you dont need nothing to mine this coin!!!just your browser !!!!

comments.author: wiewiewie
comments.body: How to mine under lin, is it possible to linux commands with arguments to achieve the same effect as win browser? I can't limit it to win.
